DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study test psychoeducational program `` Tele-Savvy . '' Tele-Savvy internet base , group education program develop person program call Savvy Caregiver . Participants randomly assign either Tele-Savvy group ( receive Tele-Savvy education ) Healthy Living Education Program ( receive healthy lifestyle education Tele-Savvy education 6 month later ) . Each program take 43 day complete . In 43 day , participant ask take part video conference per week ( 60-90 minute ) view daily video lesson ( 7-15 minute ) . They participate 5 interview course 12 month study . These interview discuss participant 's experience caregiver . All interview limit 60 minute .
